desc: Active: Take away 40% of the current health of a monster.
notes: When assigned to hell, it will deal damage based on the target's current health. The unit can not be used on monsters under-right-thing-control-of-people-play and Ancient creeps. Games using 350, 14 sec cooldown. When used on plants or eyes , would instantly destroy it.
lore: A simple but effective weapon devised to quell a great Hellbear uprising.
